script.lang:
insert into amp_columns (columnId,columnName, cellType, extractorView) (select nextval('amp_columns_seq'),'Project Implementing Unit','org.dgfoundation.amp.ar.cell.TextCell','v_project_impl_unit' where (select count(columnId) from amp_columns where extractorView='v_project_impl_unit')=0);
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_project_impl_unit AS select acc.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id,acv.category_value AS name, acv.id AS proj_impl_unit_id from amp_activities_categoryvalues acc, amp_category_value acv, amp_category_class ac where acv.id=amp_categoryvalue_id and ac.id=acv.amp_category_class_id and ac.keyName='project_impl_unit';
